content:
This is a longer note. When you click on it you’ll be able to see all the text. It's about the simple ways you can do formatting.

**To make your text bold, for example a title, use 2 asterisks before and after**

To use *italics*, use one asterisk before and after

To use bullet points, use an asterisk:

*point 1
*point 2
*point 3

Try moving this text around and playing with formatting. If you click on the close button your new note or edits to it won’t be saved.
title: Blah blah

content:
**Send notes (up to Official) directly from your desktop**

You can email or forward your notes directly to the service rather than typing them in again. Every user gets their own personal email address, and any emails sent to that will appear here automatically. You could forward good feedback you've received, or create a quick note from Outlook while you remember.

Security: This system is rated up to Official, but remember to follow your own department’s security and data protection policies as well as common sense. At this stage we can’t support attachments.

title: Bristol

content:
Commercial officers training event

2 Feb 16, 17 people

Feedback 73% Good or Very good

5 presentations

> Thank you so much for the training event you hosted for us last week. I found the presentations very interesting and they gave me a great overview of the role and future plans for our department. It was also great to meet with others in a similar situation to me. Id be very keen to be involved in future events so please let me know what youre planning.

- MJ Broadbent

> I manage 3 commercial officers and they have all fed back to me that the training was excellent. I have another 2 who I will be encouraging strongly to participate in future events.
title: Collab

content:

title: Collab

content:
Development - want to lead a team or group with strategic roadmap setting responsibilities. Have exp in leading groups, strategy writing, comms, mentoring. Seen a similar role discussed but want to know how to position myself to be a contender. Talk to Alexis? 

Relevant for Leading and communicating, Achieving commercial outcomes, Changing and improving. 

Experience with KPMG / Accenture might be an advantage. Refresh contacts, attend networking event on 14 April.
title: Places to EAT
